mapper.select: SELECT quiz_id AS quizId, title, section_title AS sectionTitle, type FROM quiz WHERE course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT q.quiz_id, q.title, q.section_title, q.type, qu.question_id, qu.content AS question_content, qu.explanation, qo.option_id, qo.content AS option_content, qo.is_correct FROM quiz q LEFT JOIN question qu ON q.quiz_id = qu.quiz_id LEFT JOIN quiz_option qo ON qu.question_id = qo.question_id WHERE q.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY q.quiz_id ASC, qu.question_id ASC, qo.option_id ASC

SELECT q.quiz_id, q.title, q.section_title, qu.question_id, qu.content AS question_content, qu.explanation, qo.option_id, qo.content AS option_content, qo.is_correct FROM quiz q LEFT JOIN question qu ON q.quiz_id = qu.quiz_id LEFT JOIN quiz_option qo ON qu.question_id = qo.question_id WHERE q.quiz_id = #{quizId} ORDER BY qu.question_id ASC, qo.option_id ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN total_questions = 0 THEN false WHEN correct_count * 100.0 / total_questions >= 60 THEN true ELSE false END AS passed FROM ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT q.question_id) AS total_questions, COUNT(CASE WHEN ua.is_correct = 'Y' THEN 1 END) AS correct_count FROM question q LEFT JOIN user_answer ua ON q.question_id = ua.question_id AND ua.user_id = #{userId} WHERE q.quiz_id = #{quizId} ) AS quiz_result
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_answer (user_id, question_id, sel_option_id, is_correct, answered_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{questionId}, #{optionId}, #{isCorrect}, NOW())
INSERT INTO quiz (course_id, section_title, title, type) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{quiz.sectionTitle}, #{quiz.title}, #{quiz.type})
INSERT INTO question (quiz_id, content, explanation) VALUES (#{quizId}, #{question.questionContent}, #{question.explanation})
INSERT INTO quiz_option (question_id, content, is_correct) VALUES (#{questionId}, #{option.optionContent}, #{option.isCorrect})
